Summary: Larger than planes and stars in area. Fireball traveled fast across the sky moving up and away. Then disappeared in mid air.
divs: Sighting DetailsLooking out over the ocean I saw a red and orange pulsating ball that looked like fire. It was traveling fast across the sky and moving up and away unlike a meteor would travel. It looked very different from a plane in color and size. Suddenly the light turned out after viewing for about 30 sec.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Kaanapali
This sighting has never been favorited.
